lender.name: MMASSE
lender.occupation: Own and Operage an IT Consulting Company
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is an excellent way to make life better for those who are willing to work hard but lack resources.
lender.occupational_info: My company provides the servcies of a full in house IT Department at a fraction of the cost. I make sure that the objectives of companies are served by IT rather than the other way around. This ensures that the IT budget is kept in check and employees are more productive.

lender.name: Christi, RJ & Justin
lender.loan_because: We care about supporting a person who wants to support themselves but lacks adequate funding to do so. We want them to succeed for their own family.
lender.occupational_info: I answer the phone, process paperwork, and make accounting entries on the computer. At school I am studying psychology. At home I raise my 2 young sons with love and goals.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
I'm excited about having my money be used to develop small business in developing areas.
Ever since visiting Belize in college, I've wanted to setup a micro-loan program specifically for the northern region of Corozal. This site lets me participate in lending programs all over the world.

lender.name: Charlaine
lender.loan_because: You Are Important
lender.occupational_info: Social Worker

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of "lending" funds to people who want to work hard for a better tomorrow. This focused approach to helping people seems like a much better way to improve the world.
lender.occupational_info: Was a helicopter pilot and a Professor at USMA. Now disabled soldier

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Money that would be quickly wasted by myself can have a significant impact on the life of others less fortunate. I concentrate in areas I've travelled before and have experienced the culture first hand.
lender.occupational_info: I run the IT Department for a national Freight Forwarding and Customs organisation.

lender.name: judy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women
lender.occupational_info: I work with children to give them love and support

lender.name: anita
lender.loan_because: I want to help enterprising people be successful.

lender.name: NursePam
lender.loan_because: I believe that the world can be a better place if everyone did just one small thing to help another person.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nursing director in a facility that helps people who are unable to care for themselves because of major mental illness.

lender.name: Marisal
lender.occupation: Vice President of InScene Systems, Business Affair

lender.name: Kelly & Diego
lender.loan_because: people have helped us along the way.

lender.name: Kate
lender.occupation: drooler / future Team Canada hockey star

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, no matter how small. This is my daughter, she has autism and wants to swim with dolfins i a natural setting. it's little, but huge to her so ... I figure I may be ale to help other as well. It's contagious, I love this!
lender.occupational_info: I think up adventure tv shows and then go make them, basically, it's living an exciting life by sharing my days with everyone. It's not nearly as glamourous as it sounds, I work for my daily bread and just happen to get vacations for sweat.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Loaning money to entrepreneurs is about the coolest thing someone can do with their money.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get elected to public office.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe this is one of best ways to empower others, giving them the opportunity to improve their standard of living, and alleviate poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Passion for fitness & wellness

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I am lucky, and I recognize that luck is something random and fleeting. I want to share my luck in the hopes that should anyone I love run out of their luck, they will not be abandoned.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become an RN and, hopefully (eventually), a nurse practitioner.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Through traveling the world, I've learned opportunity separates industrialized countries from poor countries. Today's global village enables us to share our opportunities with others, and through the process, experience the joy of giving and makeing the world a better place.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days caring for our grandson, working around our home, and spending time with our family, including my mother and my husband's parents.

lender.name: Wyatt,Molly,Kate,&Sarah
lender.loan_because: We loan to show our children the impact they can have on one person or the world.

lender.name: TAG
lender.loan_because: We want to reduce poverty. We want to offer entrepreneurs the chance to creatively earn a living.
lender.occupational_info: We are involved in health and wellness. We educate people on eating well and buying local foods when possible. We try to practice these principles ourselves.

lender.name: Martine
lender.loan_because: I want to try to help other peoples
lender.occupational_info: I do neurological examinations, blood analysis and I am also teacher for childs with a light mental handicap

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: I can and I find it is a brilliant idea to shift a tiny part of our wealth to people that aren't that fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a software engineer and I guess I am making enough money to help someone out.

lender.name: Lapin
lender.loan_because: Je suis un lapin,

lender.name: D and D
lender.loan_because: abundance is meant to keep moving

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference. With whatever small way we can.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I believe that everything is connected.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.occupational_info: I study the wind!

lender.name: Corinne
lender.loan_because: I can - and believe in the true worth of every human being - which to me is people helping people - through education, AFFORDABLE healthcare, jobs, providing a roof over one's head, feeding the hungry, and most of all, through my faith.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist whose primary art expression is in the use of and making of books in art....because I love to read, to learn, to share, and appreciate the gifts I have been given through books and fellow book artists.

lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.loan_because: It feels good to help other people in the world. It is important to me to know that by making a small loan I can make a huge difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I study hard and I am persistent at completing my work. I live in the Washington, D.C. area and I learned about Kiva.org through my school.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Everyone should get the opportunity to improve their life if they are motivated to work for it.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism and hard work. I applaud your efforts to look after yourself, your family, and to provide useful products to your community. Small business owners create wealth and jobs. I'm proud of you.
lender.occupational_info: I deal with lots of paperwork at a real estate company.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I like to give a leg up to people who are trying!

lender.occupational_info: computers, applications, Information Technology

lender.loan_because: I am generous and good hearted
lender.occupational_info: I am a conscientious grade 5 student who loves people and sports.

lender.name: Andgan
lender.loan_because: of Jesus Christ

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I look to support people around the world who "produce" - who do something that adds real value. You won't see me lending on kiva to non value-added resellers. While I currently produce nothing of real, tangible value in my own professional career, I seek to support others who do so. I earnestly aspire to be a producer one day very soon! ;)

lender.loan_because: Helping through Kiva is one way to do something useful for others.

lender.name: Griffin
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Derek

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: My daughter showed me this site and we decided we both wanted to help others across the world.

lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have challenging problems with their mental health. I try to empower them to make changes so they can lead the lives they envision for themselves.

lender.occupational_info: I am a student now, and I work part-time at my campus. I have very little money and my job does not pay well, but this is the best job that I have ever had!

lender.loan_because: He who seeds a thought, harvests a destiny
lender.occupational_info: Strategy & Marketing for an international medical device company

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by those individuals who are not afraid of hard work, individuals looking for assistance to better themselves, not just looking for a free handout. I applaud the work ethnic of Kiva participants.

lender.occupational_info: Partner with technology and business teams to build and deliver software products.

lender.occupational_info: I teach special education in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn.

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: even though my finances are not in the best order, I could afford $25 to help someone who needed it more.
lender.occupational_info: I design packages and marketing materials.

lender.name: Claus Moeller
lender.loan_because: There are many good reasons for lending. We especially loan to buy water buffaloes. A water buffalo can lead a poor family out of poverty and give them a chance for a brighter future filled with hope and free from hunger. The animal provides draft power for planting rice and potatoes, milk for protein, and manure for fertilizer and fuel. A family can plant four times more rice with a water buffalo than by hand. The animal can haul heavy loads to market, where the sale of extra produce brings needed income for clothing, medicine, and school.

lender.name: LaFlorcita
lender.loan_because: I have little, but I am grateful for what I have. My faith teaches me that everything given will be returned sevenfold, but 98% is fine with me!
lender.occupational_info: I love to help people understand their world in a way that makes them feel more at one with the Universe! I am an artisan and will be offering my creations at my website soon.

lender.name: György
lender.loan_because: ... because I believe in work, in help each other, in trusty.

lender.name: UNITED PHOTO PRESS
lender.occupational_info: UNITED PHOTO PRESS is a photographic agency of great diversity and distinction owned by its photographer members, in Europe and Brasil. With powerful individual vision, United photographers chronicle the world and interpret its peoples, events, issues and personalities. The UPP library is a living archive updated daily with across the globe. You may search or browse our 10000,000+ images which are available online for licensing in a variety of formats. Keep up to date with our events, exhibitions, features, books and news.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Maybe it's possible to change somebody's life for the better.

lender.name: Alexandre
lender.loan_because:
-- The Starfish Story --
A young man is walking along the ocean and sees a beach on which thousands and thousands of starfish have washed ashore. Further along he sees an old man, walking slowly and stopping often, picking up one starfish after another and tossing each one gently into the ocean.
"Why are you throwing starfish into the ocean?," he asks.
"Because the sun is up and the tide is going out and if I don't throw them further in they will die."
"But, old man, don't you realize there are miles and miles of beach and starfish all along it! You can't possibly save them all, you can't even save one-tenth of them. In fact, even if you work all day, your efforts won't make any difference at all."
The old man listened calmly and then bent down to pick up another starfish and gently tossed it into the sea. "It made a difference to that one."
lender.occupational_info: Wireless Telecom Engineer

lender.name: Felisbela
lender.loan_because: Olá. I have 42 years, am Portuguese, have 3 children and am teacher. I am separate, I have you divide to pay and I do not have any type of aids, needed aid. lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I think that this is a right way to express my solidarity to my fellows. This is a way to compassionate active to others. We must venerate the dignity of everyone. It is more ethical and more positive to offer to someone poor fellow the occasion to do something for his/her life, than to give him/her money or something else, like the traditional philanthropy.
lender.occupational_info: I work as Advocate (Lawyer) for more than 33 years. I have my own Law Office. I think that the Advocate occupation is very interesting and very useful. The Advocates from the years of the Athenian Republic are or better must be the guardians of the Democracy. There is no Advocate without freedom of the thought or freedom of the speech. I like my Greek language and I write novels and short stories and poems. This is a way to express my mind and my soul...

lender.loan_because: tis the right thing to do.

lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of what Jesus called the good news of the kingdom of God. To love mercy, do justly and walk humbly with God.
lender.occupational_info: I live on a small farm in San Jacinto, California with my wife Jolynne (a photographer) and our four kids.

lender.occupational_info: I drive ships.

lender.name: Jonathan and Megan
lender.loan_because: After being lucky enough to be born in the US where we & our families have had access to loans for school, cars & houses, we've decided we should return the favor by loaning out money we raised at our wedding to people who would otherwise not have access to loans.

lender.name: srinivas
lender.loan_because: i dont want someone worry about money instead they can utilize their energy to make better living.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending college pursuing a bachelor's degree in chemistry. I am planning on attending medical school.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro finance is one of the best ways to mitigate poverty. There are too many talented, motivated people out there being held back by lack of access to capital, and I am glad to play a tiny role is alleviating that issue.
lender.occupational_info: I help to grow businesses through marketing and business development.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to reach out a helping hand and touch people thousands of miles away. I always support people trying to accomplish their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have been hospitalized with infections, injuries, or for surgeries. I love taking care of the children and their families by answering questions, providing treatments and medications, and being there to provide comfort. I love being a nurse!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I feel that every person has the right to do better for themselves, but sometimes to do better one needs a hand up.

lender.name: Andrea

lender.occupational_info: Don't wait. Do what I can today! Do more someday.

lender.name: Raheem
lender.occupation: President of Los Angeles Microfinance Network
lender.loan_because: I believe access to credit is a fundamental human right, and poverty eradication begins from the bottom up. We all have the capacity to make real change in the world, and it's important to remember that a little money goes a long way around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am trying to increase awareness of Microfinance around Los Angeles through networking events and speaking events. We want to connect likeminded Microfinanciers to others in their own communities, ultimately spreading the good word.

lender.name: Jasmin
lender.loan_because: As I started my own business I had to go through some tough times where I often didn't know if my money would be enough to pay my rent. But the difference is that I live in a rich country which gives some payments to people who suffer from poor and try to build theit own business. Many countries can't afford this sort of payments, that's why I decides to pay something back - now as my business runs!!!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a business coach and management trainer where I teach business skills to people who have to or want to fit better in their business role. Work-Life-Balance and stress-counseling are some of my favorite methods.
